channel.title: Original Glock and Shotgun skins
channel.description: Good Night, everyone. I need the original Glock and SPAS-12 skins (models and sounds), because i installed skins for it, but it dont worked. i wanna the original files. Can someone help me? And re-installing black mesa isnt an option. i dont have time for that
